questionText: EgyptAir flight 990's autopilot was switched off.
author: A22VACRM9GC73M

questionText: Cockpit voice recordings indicated that someone uttered a prayer in Arabic just before the autopilot disengaged.
author: A2YKW761AK4ZGY

questionText: EgyptAir Flight 990 crashed into the Atlantic on October 31 1999.
author: A2YKW761AK4ZGY

questionText: The flight recorder revealed that the cockpit turned off both engines.
author: A2YKW761AK4ZGY

questionText: Both engines had been switched off from the cockpit.
author: A2Q3FS9G8ITCN7

questionText: EgyptAir flight 990 plummeted 15,000 feet, but then climbed 8000 feet before its final fall to the ocean.
author: A22VACRM9GC73M

questionText: All 217 people on board Flight 990 died when it crashed.
author: A2YKW761AK4ZGY

questionText: Computer shutdown was speculated as the cause of the crash of EgyptAir Flight 990.
author: A22VACRM9GC73M
